remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问属性对象检索对象。Accessing the property of a object retrieves a object. 此集合实现接口 (通过对象); 它实现所有属性和方法的接口。This collection implements the interface (through the object); it implements all properties and methods of the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来访问设备特定/选择构造中的选项。The following code example shows how to use the class to gain access to the choices in a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct. 为方便起见，包含筛选器的 Web.config 文件的示例代码的后面。For your convenience, a Web.config file containing the filters follows the example code. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为-1`index`参数指定的命令将添加到集合的末尾。A value of -1 for the `index` parameter specifies that the command is added to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是位于只读接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 你可以使用其中此方法适用的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除集合中的或有关的所有样式，它将都清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到字段的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的控件，并要求你将数据重新绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.
